experience.title: Led Global Yahoo Search FE integration with Microsoft Bing Search content partnership (40+ markets rollout). Coordinated with UX design, data content analysis, product strategy, and middleware integration from 2019 to 2020. Drove positive user engagement with a neutral revenue impact on Search UX.
Experienced in the FE product rollout for worldwide markets (40+ markets) including i18n and l10n.
Organized and Strengthened Yahoo APAC TW/HK Search Product, Content, and engineering in 2021 and 2022
description: Built Yahoo Masks Search and Yahoo Rapid Test Search in TW market during the COVID-19 outbreak period. Leveraged the existing search platform and integrated with the government open data API. Conducted the plan with cross-functional teams and departments including engineering, design, product, and content analysis.
Engineered and Executed the TW, HK product ads integration with Microsoft engineering, Yahoo Search (BE/FE engineering, business development, and product).
Drove Traditional Chinese query understanding improvement (6 months) for explicit local intent which increased 15% coverage for local search in TW market.

experience.title: Drove unified semantic-classes framework in Search FE to speed up A/B testing in 2017Q4; A pixel-perfect project with neutral metrics judgment which shipped a flexible, reliable, and maintainable css framework on Yahoo Search.

Engaged Global Search FE platform migration in 2015, 2017, 2018, and developed search functionality under different stacks, languages, and frameworks including PHP 5.6, PHP 7.1, YUI 3, Node.js, React, Redux.
Yahoo Local Search FE engineering owner on the mobile web; Involved in reflowing the modern intuitive design which reduces the action steps and it impacted ~10 million PV/day.
Drove and rollout international iOS Search SDK release pipeline leveraged the domain knowledge with search end-to-end integration.
